comment.author: 42402526@N00
comment._content: The name of the director of the Metropolitan Opera ist Heinrich Conried, not "Conreid" as written in the title and the description of the foto. As Conried died on 27 Apr 1909, the foto can be dated correctly with 1909. Source: de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heinrich_Conried

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: ..and there's a 1909 date in the margin.

comment.author: 65444072@N00
comment._content: Please see this article in the NY Times about Heinrich CONRIED's death - I have added relevant tags and will add more: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?_r=1&res=9B07E... I tried to post the corresponding tinyurl - but I was told to my amazement, it had been used for abuse on Flickr - so if the above URL does not work, paste it in two or more parts into your browser. Alexandria42

comment.author: 65444072@N00
comment._content: The photograph can clearly be dated from this article as May 13 1909: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9903E4D8153EE7... Heinrich CONRIED was buried at Cypress Hills Cemetery after the funeral at the Metropolitan Opera House: query.nytimes.com/mem/archive-free/pdf?res=9806E5DE1E31E7... The mourners included family members: SPERLING FRANK SOLKY. Heinrich was the uncle of Hans CONRIED Snr and gt-uncle of Hans CONRIED Jnr: Alexandria42
